member.name: IInputPaneInterop.GetForWindow
member.summary: Gets an instance of an InputPane object for the specified window.
member.param: The top-level () window for which you want to get the InputPane object.
The interface identifier for the interface that you want to get in the inputPane parameter. This value is typically IID_IInputPane or IID_IInputPane2, as defined in Windows.UI.ViewManagement.h.

The InputPane object for the window that the appWindow parameter specifies. This parameter is typically a pointer to an IInputPane or IInputPane2 interface, as defined in Windows.UI.ViewManagement.idl.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IInputPaneInterop
member.summary: Enables access to the members of the InputPane class in a desktop app.
